data.name: BlastMania
data.detailed_description:
BlastMania is an incredibly challenging VR game. Destroy as many robots as possible and survive until the end !

  • Your mission : complete 10 rounds and defeat the boss to rank yourself among all the other players.

  • Unlock abilities and upgrade your weapons at the end of each round to survive to the next one.

  • Make the best decisions to optimize your run and earn as many points as you can to reach the top of the leaderboard.

  • Train and improve yourself to complete all modes in the highest difficulty level. Each mode has its own leaderboard and can be played in 3 difficulty levels.

  • Complete achievements to unlock all modes, skins and maps !

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
